page.title: 17A Day in the Life of Dafydd
page.content: After play at school I do story writing.We talk about our story before we begin writing.At the end of the morning I have another playtime and a dinner of potatoes,peas and sausage.In the afternoon I do Drama and Art which is fun.I drew a picture of a giant called Paul who did not ever have Summer in his garden because he was mean and never shared his things. At 3:30 p.m.I go home and ride on my bike with my older brother until tea time.For tea I have salad and crisps.I like to watch cartoon time on television with my mum and dad because we all laugh a lot.Sometimes I go to Cubs where I play games and learn about tracking and camping.At 7:30p.m. I go to bed and read my book for a while before falling asleep.
